title: Lebron Makes History, Warrior's Slump, NBA Draft Talk | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Lebron Makes History, Warrior's Slump, NBA Draft Talk | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
WHAT'S BURNIN is back as the boys breakdown Lebron's record-breaking week and discuss the Warrior's current slump and issues heading into the final weeks of the season. Plus, they preview the week ahead and discuss the young hoopers who showcased themselves in March Madness.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
